summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. Several vehicles are visible ahead, including a white sedan and a red car. The traffic appears to be moving smoothly without any sudden changes in speed or direction.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position throughout the segment. The vehicle is following the traffic flow and keeping a safe distance from the cars ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 30 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Front: A red car, approximately 25 meters away, moving steadily in the adjacent lane.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a red SUV
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. A white sedan is seen ahead, and a red SUV is on the right side. The white sedan moves into the self-vehicles lane abruptly, causing a potential cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while observing the white sedan ahead. The white sedan suddenly moves into the self-vehicles lane from the adjacent lane, causing the self-vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving into the self-vehicles lane abruptly. 2) Right: A red SUV, approximately 3 meters away, maintaining its lane.
